Key Match Events: Attys Christopher opened the scoring for Haiti with a header from a corner in the 40th minute [1-0]
Duckens Nazon scored with a header in the 59th minute [2-0] before scoring his double in the 75th minute [3-0]
Mikael Cantave scored for Haiti in the 77th minute [4-0]
Nazon added his hat-trick in the 82nd minute [5-0]
Cantave secured his double in the 85th minute [6-0]
Pre-Game Insights: French coach Sébastien Migné revealed his starting 11 with several changes, as he had announced in order to allow several players to prove their ability
Post-Match Reflections: This victory consolidates the Grenadiers' leadership in Group C
Mission accomplished for coach Sébastien Migné, who aimed to get as many points as possible during this September gathering in Puerto Rico
Miscellaneous Highlights: Goalkeeper Jhony Placide got his first clean sheet in this group stage
